text:
That girl being played by @MayaRudolph on @nbcsnl?

That girl was me. http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/EFof4q4XUAILuZ8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/EFof4q4XUAILuZ8.mp4

#RoshHashanah is an opportunity to reflect and set our intentions. For me, that's committing myself to a spirit of hopefulness and manifesting a greater sense of kindness toward those around me. L'Shanah Tovah to everyone celebrating! May you be blessed with a sweet year.
I look forward to seeing Donald Trump impeached as soon as possible.
L’Shanah Tovah! Wishing a happy, healthy and sweet new year to all celebrating Rosh Hashanah.

We have a man in the White House lining his own pockets and the pockets of the top 1%, while hardworking Americans struggle to pay their rent on time or pay off their medical bills. As president, I will pass the LIFT and raise incomes for middle-class families by up to $500/mo.

Trump will have nearly unlimited money the top 1%. We have something far more powerful  — over a million grassroots donors ready to take on the billionaire class. Donate now at http://live.berniesanders.com: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cGDzVjMyNzU3OTl8MU1ZeE5QUWVsV29Hd05VfvqpIdtNeI0R36kEyy-aJSpQpbFc0esUbvYNrKuq

In case you missed it, I joined #WITHpod with @chrislhayes at #TribFest19 where we discussed climate change, President Trump’s leadership, US national security, and other important issues impacting Texans. 

Watch it here —> https://www.texastribune.org/2019/09/20/ted-cruz-texas-tribune-festival/?utm_campaign=trib-social&utm_content=1569676270&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter

.@SenateMajLdr McConnell seems to think he can wait out the calls for him to bring up background check legislation.

He’s wrong – we aren’t going anywhere. #EndGunViolence http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1178016503662297088/img/Df8VdlYOsf5I03SD.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178016503662297088/vid/480x270/MMkCbHZmabA10b0Y.mp4?tag=13

We have millions of people in our country who have gone bankrupt, and what did they do?

Did they take a risk on Wall Street?
Did they buy real estate that worked out badly?

No, they got cancer. Or they couldn't afford medicine for their kid. That is unconscionable.

Together, we are going to defeat the most corrupt president in recent history and finally build a country that works for working people, not just the 1%. Join our rally live in Plymouth, NH: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cGDO7jMyNzU3OTl8MU9kSnJMTW5rbVZLWF1iA4nZdEZvZ40kWRGy5tlwkrM_yS6OOKI499OUDIQS

RT @BNeidhardt This Sunday morning, watch these Iowans tell @BernieSanders about the unnecessary pain caused by a corrupt health care system designed to generate profits for wealthy pharma and insurance execs. 

Medicare for All is the only answer. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1178022641967468549/img/UU_zMZ5NohI4nKHH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178022641967468549/vid/320x320/f021iixzd38khr_r.mp4?tag=13
.@realDonaldTrump’s lawless actions are a direct threat to America’s national security. #TruthExposed http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFousfpW4AMUgDt.jpg

RT @MotherJones • The oceans are warming and rising faster than we thought
• More than a billion people live in affected areas
• We’re closer than we realized to irreversible melting of permafrost https://www.motherjones.com/environment/2019/09/rising-seas-arent-even-the-scariest-part-of-climate-change-in-the-oceans/

Alec Smith died at 26 because he was rationing insulin that was too expensive. Corporate greed is taking the lives of Americans and it needs to end now. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFpEhXaUcAAqSU8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178327004527022080/vid/320x320/H6euCTvOHj_l2-Dy.mp4?tag=13

RT @Rouell3 These are Iowans. Our friends, neighbors and family and they need Medicare for All — not political excuses, policy wavering or half measured solutions. 

Anything other than Medicare for All is failing them and their real tragedies. Let’s not let them down #IACaucus #Bernie2020 https://twitter.com/berniesanders/status/1178027290321735682 QT @BernieSanders I don't understand how politicians can hear stories like these and not think our health care system is barbaric.

Our people deserve better.

We are going to pass Medicare for All. We are going to eliminate medical debt. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1178022641967468549/img/UU_zMZ5NohI4nKHH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178022641967468549/vid/320x320/f021iixzd38khr_r.mp4?tag=13

Black students graduate on average with $4,000 more in student loans than white students.

Our plan to cancel all student debt with a tax on Wall Street will cut the racial wealth gap among young Americans by more than half. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1178377842373140480/img/cyxbnTjmEMp_pIcv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178377842373140480/vid/320x320/hHC3D5eDl_yqTHG3.mp4?tag=13

Trump thinks he can win re-election by dividing us up. We're not going to let that happen. Millions of people are coming together to create a country based on justice. Join us live at Dartmouth: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cGEeqTMyNzU3OTl8MUx5R0JMWVpaTk14Tjpb9LzceA-oGxPkruykuUR4-FQc5gGqW0hdFiAbSfq7
Celebrate #NationalCoffeeDay with this brew-ti-ful mug: https://shop.corybooker.com/cory-booker-tweet-15oz-ceramic-mug/?utm_source=cory2020&utm_medium=social

I’m calling a few more grassroots donors from the road today to thank them for chipping in to our campaign! If you donate now, I could call you next: http://ewar.ren/call http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFqiLrYXUAAh4vM.jpg

Honored to speak yesterday with members of the AAPI community at the International Hotel in San Francisco, the birthplace of the Asian American rights movement. Together we're fighting #ForThePeople. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFpVrCqXkAACDmB.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178348111946768385/vid/320x320/JuwT3W3SZDhaFHy6.mp4?tag=13

Thank you, @JulianCastro! https://twitter.com/juliancastro/status/1176879704499994625 QT @JulianCastro Lawmakers talk a lot about supporting and strengthening the middle class—but often forget the poor and working poor. 

I applaud @AOC for putting forward a bold package of bills to address poverty and inequality—as well as the systemic causes behind them.
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFQvzeuWkAEr53C.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1176616806624235521/vid/320x320/MzZ8Ba-YgxCiNERR.mp4?tag=13
@alainamonts I’m so sorry I missed you, Alaina! Thank you so much for chipping in to our campaign. Stay strong out there!

I got a chance to say thank you to Juliana from Brooklyn, who chipped in $5 to our grassroots campaign. And she’ll be a first-time voter! Thank you, Juliana. http://ewar.ren/call http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFqlUcdWsAA0JHq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178433914895032320/vid/320x320/K9ZNfLnOrSIkWGdc.mp4?tag=13

I talked with Maura, a lawyer from NYC, earlier today. She chipped in $3 to this fight for big, structural change. Thank you, Maura! http://ewar.ren/call http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFm1PLBX0AE5aqC.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178170498917818368/vid/320x320/akZO0bgJ4wV9a9Ad.mp4?tag=13

I’m grateful for Lucas from Arizona, who chipped in $10 to our grassroots campaign. We talked about the importance of building a grassroots movement to hold our government accountable. Thanks, Lucas! http://ewar.ren/call http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFm8UxrXYAAYRiV.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178179045659426816/vid/320x320/wc-TstDt5u6GzLzf.mp4?tag=13

Last time I checked, the Constitution doesn’t say anything about presidents being allowed to use taxpayer dollars to shake down foreign leaders for investigations that will help their political campaigns. #ExposeTheTruth http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1178016503855222785/img/UT9wgg4UTyicrSvz.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178016503855222785/vid/480x270/L_6Nt4rFA2uk1cRk.mp4?tag=13

Sen. Rubio wishes L’Shanah Tovah to the Jewish community as they begin celebrating Rosh Hashanah http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/EFqhsZMWwAAQpdY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/EFqhsZMWwAAQpdY.mp4

Hillary Clinton served our country with distinction and always put our country first — something Trump knows nothing about.
https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1178082039792312320 QT @washingtonpost Exclusive: State Department intensifies email probe of Hillary Clinton's former aides https://trib.al/XIcOWBQ

Trump Tower used as a piggy bank was enough.

10 incidents of obstruction of justice was enough.

Permanently separating children & parents for profit was enough.

Detention camps were enough.

Muslim ban was enough.

Trans servicemember ban was enough.

Ukraine is beyond enough.

I've been a public school teacher. And I'm committed to having a Secretary of Education who has also been a public school teacher. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFpj2mUWkAEcAnb.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178363105425932288/vid/480x270/JVlwDVvccQnScn3Q.mp4?tag=13

We have a big deadline coming up and an ambitious goal: 25,000 contributions before midnight.

Chip in $27 or whatever you can to help us get there: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bernie-september-eoq?refcode=tw190929-2

Growing up, my parents taught me all about civic activism, not just by telling, but by showing. So I’m always grateful when parents bring their kids to our events. It’s the best way we can inspire the next generation of activists. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFp2ALBWwAY7ZO1.jpg
L'shana tovah to all who observe Rosh Hashanah. May it be a good and peaceful year.

RT @AOC Today I’m showing some love to @RepMaxineWaters + @RashidaTlaib, who endured the brunt of gaslighting & vitriol for being among the first to recognize WH corruption & publicly advocate for impeachment, making it easier for the rest of us.

People think that’s easy. It’s not.
L’Shanah Tovah to all who are celebrating Rosh Hashanah. May your new year be filled with good health and happiness.

I want people to be able to run for office without having to beg for money from rich people and corporations. That's why we are entirely grassroots-funded.

Donate $27 or whatever you can before our big Monday deadline to say you're with us: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bernie-september-eoq?refcode=tw190929-1

The most startling thing about @realDonaldTrump’s behavior is how he fails to recognize the severity of his abuses of power. @60Minutes #ExposeTheTruth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFrDQonW4AAb5ik.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178468439079428096/vid/480x270/tX8HkEmhvBY6fe3c.mp4?tag=13

.@RepAlGreen and @RepMaxineWaters have been saying from the beginning that impeachment proceedings need to start. It was because of their foresight and vision that we are here today. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFqV0zuWkAI_2Ro.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178418590829203456/vid/480x270/eaiWZt9JJGUvjBa7.mp4?tag=13

GM made billions of dollars in profits, but closed multiple plants in the United States. GM has no loyalty to the workers of America or the people of America. @UAW workers are fighting back—and I'm proud to march alongside them. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFo7G_LWsAAZ0nH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178317013569155072/vid/480x270/z7rDLSYXmTWu_qDo.mp4?tag=13

It's going to take big, structural change to tackle poverty and inequality in the U.S., and @AOC's "A Just Society" is just the type of bold, comprehensive thinking we'll need to get it done. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/25/us/politics/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-poverty.html
To all who are celebrating Rosh Hashanah in NJ, throughout America, and across the world - l’shana tovah, and may your coming year be one filled with joy.

RT @erinruberry World War II veteran James South wants to receive 100 birthday cards for his 100th birthday on October 7.

You can send a card to: 

5800 North Park Drive
Watauga, TX 76148

https://www.wfaa.com/article/life/heartwarming/100-birthday-cards-world-war-ii-veteran-in-texas/287-373a4d7d-cb1a-424f-919d-73eb65bf05c2

Unlike Mitch McConnell and Donald Trump, I will not turn my back on communities who are hurting.

We will not abandon places that rely on fossil fuel jobs. We are going to rebuild them. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFo8izzWoAAtrUs.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178319476460261377/vid/480x270/k6qffLR6BdsFpW7s.mp4?tag=13

Our big FEC fundraising deadline is tomorrow, but you won’t find me jetting from city to city scooping up big checks from wealthy donors and special interests.

This campaign is powered by grassroots donors. Will you chip in $3 now? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/soc-eoqq32019?refcode=soc-FR-ew-tw-q3eoq19-20190929

RT @cjmab28 Wow! @BernieSanders volunteers have already made almost 200,000 calls towards our 1 million goal - and they just started yesterday!

Want to help elect Bernie Sanders? Hop onto the dialer and talk to voters now: /call/

#Honorthem https://twitter.com/usarmy/status/1178294605617537025 QT @USArmy Remember & #Honorthem

Today is #GoldStarMothersDay and we recognize them for the support they continue to provide. 

Take the time to thank a #goldstar family member and recognize the sacrifices they make when a loved one dies serving the nation. 

Video by Elliot Valdez http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFeYFUGXoAABJdn.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1177575446277435393/vid/480x270/YhqAPTeqh6Vc6X5H.mp4?tag=13

We are at a crucial moment in the history of our country. Chip in $5 now and stand with me as we defend our democracy and the values that make us who we are→
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kdh-social-1909?refcode=tw190929-crucialmoment

Judge Sonia Sotomayor has fought for the voices of the people ever since her first case voting against corporations in Citizens United. As a critical voice on the bench, she’s showing all our children what’s possible. #HispanicHeritageMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFqIRbeW4AU9J3I.jpg
@texasdemocrats @SpeakerPelosi 💪🏻💪🏻💪🏻

Congress must not turn away from its duty to protect America’s elections and defend our constitution, just as generations before us have done. #ExposeTheTruth http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1178016503674916864/img/4TveLZCdg6GAYEBe.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178016503674916864/vid/480x270/trCwTlzpTeI9MWNE.mp4?tag=13

RT @AndrewGillum 👋🏾 everybody, @CheriBustos & I need you to know how we’re going to grow the @HouseDemocrats Majority!

#RegisterEngageWin
🎥 at #TribFest2019 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1178084773555625984/pu/img/K17L2LyztBJnMqza.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1178084773555625984/pu/vid/480x270/-qJQwBzupE3zDvgB.mp4?tag=10

Right now, we've got an economy that's working great for those at the top, but not so great for everyone else. We need big structural change to make sure everyone has an opportunity to succeed—starting with a two-cent wealth tax. https://www.npr.org/2019/09/26/764654623/u-s-income-inequality-worsens-widening-to-a-new-gap
Tax Wall Street and cancel it. https://twitter.com/Fidelity/status/1176945980656279552 QT @Fidelity Q7. What’s the best strategy for dealing with the stress of paying off student loan debt? #FidChats

RT @texasdemocrats It’s been an eventful week for @SpeakerPelosi. 

How did she decide to finish it? By addressing @texasdemocrats this morning.

Texas is the biggest battleground state. Period. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFozFIOXoAADXgu.jpg

This week, in addition to officially launching a formal impeachment inquiry into @realDonaldTrump’s abuses of power, we continued the fight to #EndGunViolence and met with @jvn to discuss the #EqualityAct. https://link.medium.com/Q00OzR3Yn0
@jdakwar Thanks!

Henry Kissinger was one of the most destructive Secretaries of State in the history of this country.

A Sanders administration will not be taking advice from Henry Kissinger. https://twitter.com/SecPompeo/status/1178115067239452672 QT @SecPompeo Honored to meet again with one of my most esteemed predecessors, Dr. Henry Kissinger. I'm always grateful for our conversations. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFmBZvHX0AA31Zv.jpg

Cancel student debt. https://twitter.com/samswey/status/1178381130527105024 QT @samswey 20 years after starting college, black student loan borrower still owe 95% of the debt while white students have paid 94% of their debt off. The racial wealth gap is exacerbated by the student loan debt crisis. https://assetfunders.org/wp-content/uploads/Stalling-Dreams.pdf http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFpzY1uXUAATPZD.jpg

This is what call time means to me: Talking with grassroots donors who give whatever they can to build this movement. I'm making more calls tomorrow. Chip in $3 or whatever you can, and I might just call you to say thanks! http://ewar.ren/call http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFrMVqCXYAAEbCb.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178475138137956354/vid/320x320/wXlO-GfFlKEF0UWm.mp4?tag=13

Last week, the House passed a bill to give marijuana businesses access to banking. That’s important, but it's not enough.

We need to legalize marijuana at the federal level, expunge criminal records, and create paths for people of color to enter the legal marijuana industry.
On this #GoldStarMothersDay, Bruce and I are thinking of Gold Star moms everywhere. Our hearts go out to you, and we are grateful for your strength and resolve.

Shana Tovah to our neighbors and family in NY-14 and across the world! 🍎🍯 

Here’s to a happy and sweet new year for all. #RoshHashanah
@MaloneysMovies Happy birthday, Scout! Keep fighting for the things you believe in—I'll be right there with you.

May this new year usher in a time of joy, prosperity and peace for Jewish families in the United States and around the world.  Shana tovah u’metukah – may you have a happy, healthy, sweet new year. https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/92719-2 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFqu0sqWkAEh5OG.jpg

Astros clinch home-field through World Series. 106 Ws. Verlander gets 3000 career Ks. Wow.  #GoStros #TakeItBack  https://www.crawfishboxes.com/2019/9/29/20889374/mlb-scores-astros-6-angels-3-verlander-gets-3000th-career-strikeout-300th-for-season

These murals in San Francisco—painted by local climate change activists—are simply stunning. We must heed their call to action. https://www.cnn.com/2019/09/26/us/sf-mural-climate-protest-trnd/index.html?utm_medium=social&utm_content=2019-09-26T19%3A20%3A04&utm_term=link&utm_source=twCNN

I've known @HarrisonJaime since we were at Yale together—and let me tell you, this guy is special. Deeply committed to helping people, a fierce advocate for his community, Jaime is exactly who South Carolinians need in their corner. I was so proud to join him today in Orangeburg. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFqsr5YWoAAh7gT.jpg

Karylinda works at GM and is out on strike—but she still donated $3. So I called her to say thank you. We're all in this fight together, Karylinda. http://ewar.ren/call http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFqxp06XYAkwHBu.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1178447233089462273/vid/320x320/AC6nnV16BhQfyLpq.mp4?tag=13
Heidi and I wish a Shana Tova - a happy, healthy, and sweet new year - to everyone celebrating Rosh Hashanah in Texas & around the world. #RoshHashanah http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFqYIOGWoAA6Qlk.jpg

We've got to break the grip of corporate lobbyists on Congress—and I've got a plan for that. https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-news/warren-lobbyists-corruption-office-technology-assessment-891544/

I saw firsthand how Kavanaugh's confirmation process was not a serious pursuit of truth or justice. His seat on the Supreme Court is a stain on our justice system—but we can get it right.
 
I called for an impeachment inquiry into Kavanaugh, here's why. https://www.elle.com/culture/career-politics/a29209992/equal-justice-under-the-law-prove-it-investigate-kavanaugh/
Every time I talk to a grassroots donor, I feel fired up about the big, structural change we can build together. I’m calling more people today—chip in $3 if you want to chat. http://ewar.ren/call
